fii.panels.applications.structure=Structure
## Translations for Course Sheet course.sheet.conditions.hint=(if applicable) course.sheet.conditions=Conditions course.sheet.content=Content course.sheet.course=Course course.sheet.courseInfo=Information about the Course course.sheet.courseType.hint=~* //OB – Compulsory / OP – Optional// course.sheet.credits.hint=~* //Obs. T = C + S// course.sheet.evaluation.activityType=Activity type course.sheet.evaluation.criteria=Evaluation criteria course.sheet.evaluation.methods=Evaluation methods course.sheet.evaluation.percentage=Percentage in final grade~(%) course.sheet.evaluation=Evaluation course.sheet.laboratory=Laboratory course.sheet.laboratorySeminar=Laboratory/Seminar course.sheet.methods=Teaching methods course.sheet.notes=Notes course.sheet.objectives=Objectives course.sheet.preconditions.hint=(if applicable) course.sheet.preconditions=Preconditions course.sheet.specificCompetencies=Specific competencies course.sheet.studyProgramInfo=Information about the Study Program course.sheet.time.distribution=Time distribution course.sheet.time.estimationInfo.hint=(hours per semester and study activities) course.sheet.time.estimationInfo=Total Estimated Time course.sheet.time.hours=hours course.sheet.time.totalIndividual=Total hours of individual study [ST + DS + PS] course.sheet.time.totalSemester=Total hour per semester [no. of credits x 30 = T + E + C +TI]
